name: Nidoqueen
author: PLANETA
flavor_text: The body is covered by stiff, needle-like scales. If it becomes excited, the needles bristle outwards.

ancient_trait.name: Ω  Barrage
ancient_trait.effect: This Pokémon may attack twice a turn. (If the first attack Knocks Out your opponent’s Active Pokémon, you may attack again after your opponent chooses a new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Dynamite Punch
attacks.effect: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself. Don’t apply Weakness to this damage.
